title: Alta Watch Face Collection
summary: Finally great looking Watch faces for your Android Wear. So many to choose from.
description: Today, our high quality and great looking watch face turn your Android Wear watch into something more than just useful, its looks can now compete with luxury watches. Figure it out yourself downloading our collection, you won’t know what to choose from our numerous watch face designs.Give a personality alike to yours to your Android Wear watch, dress it with different colors, different styles from our multiple designs collection, going from basics to the most creative, directly inspired from luxury models or created from the most beautiful alliance of shapes and colors.FEATURES✔ Change watch face directly from watch✔ Detect automatically if watch is square or circle✔ Date✔ Digital Time✔ Phone battery level ✔ Weatherand many more options.INSTALLATION1 - Download alta watch face collection2- The application install automatically on your phone and after on your watch android wear.3- A card is showing on your screen when installation is completed.4- Appuyez longuement sur l'écran de votre montre et sélectionné Alta Collection.4- Press for a while on your screen and select Alta CollectionPERMISSIONS- android.permission.INTERNETAllows us to obtain local weather information- android.permission.WAKE_LOCKAllows us to activate the watch when user moves his arm- android.permission.VIBRATEAllows to notify about changes on watch (Wizz, successful sync, etc...) can be deactivated in the app's options.- android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATEAllows us to check on the network to save battery.- android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIONAllows us to find the user's approximate position through the GPS network to obtain the local weather.- android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOWIs only used with the aim to detect the type of watch (square or circle).- android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATEDeterminates phone or watch battery level.
descriptionHTML:
Today, our high quality and great looking watch face turn your Android Wear watch into something more than just useful, its looks can now compete with luxury watches. Figure it out yourself downloading our collection, you won’t know what to choose from our numerous watch face designs.
Give a personality alike to yours to your Android Wear watch, dress it with different colors, different styles from our multiple designs collection, going from basics to the most creative, directly inspired from luxury models or created from the most beautiful alliance of shapes and colors.


FEATURES

✔ Change watch face directly from watch
✔ Detect automatically if watch is square or circle
✔ Date
✔ Digital Time
✔ Phone battery level
✔ Weather

and many more options.

INSTALLATION

1 - Download alta watch face collection
2- The application install automatically on your phone and after on your watch android wear.
3- A card is showing on your screen when installation is completed.
4- Appuyez longuement sur l'écran de votre montre et sélectionné Alta Collection.
4- Press for a while on your screen and select Alta Collection


PERMISSIONS

- android.permission.INTERNET
Allows us to obtain local weather information

- android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
Allows us to activate the watch when user moves his arm

- android.permission.VIBRATE
Allows to notify about changes on watch (Wizz, successful sync, etc...) can be deactivated in the app's options.

- android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
Allows us to check on the network to save battery.

- android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
Allows us to find the user's approximate position through the GPS network to obtain the local weather.

- android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
Is only used with the aim to detect the type of watch (square or circle).

- android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE
Determinates phone or watch battery level.
recentChanges: * 2 new watch face designs : Quiver et FancyStripes
* The app is available on Android 4.3
